name: Dewloren, Tiger King of the Ice Barrier
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner WATER monsters
You can target any number of other face-up cards you control; return those targets to the hand, then, this card gains 500 ATK for each card returned to the hand by this effect, until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Dewloren, Tiger King of the Ice Barrier" once per turn.
